      The ssl facotory to construct ssl socket by default.
      private javax.net.ssl.SSLSocket sslsocket
      The internal ssl socket to connect to CSIF.

      • getConnection

        public javax.net.ssl.SSLSocket getConnection(java.net.InetAddress host,
                                             int port)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: Connection
        Method to get the connection to server, acquire the connection clarified by detailed class.
        指定者:
        getConnection 在接口中 Connection
        参数:
        host - The CSIF host address.
        port - The CSIF port.
        返回:
        The Connection object to use.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Connect Exception.
